## ðŸŽ¨ Art Example 1: Simple patterns with basic symbols
Let's create patterns using loops and basic keyboard symbols

```{r}
print("--- Simple Hash Pattern ---")
for (row in 1:5) {
  pattern <- ""
  for (col in 1:row) {
    pattern <- paste(pattern, "#", sep="")
  }
  print(pattern)
}
```

## ðŸŽ¨ Art Example 5: Christmas tree pattern

```{r}
print("\n--- Christmas Tree Pattern ---")
for (row in 1:5) {
  # Add spaces for centering
  spaces <- ""
  for (space in 1:(5-row)) {
    spaces <- paste(spaces, " ", sep="")
  }
  
  # Add stars for the tree
  stars <- ""
  for (star in 1:(2*row-1)) {
    stars <- paste(stars, "ðŸŽ„", sep="")
  }
  
  # Print the complete line
  print(paste(spaces, stars, sep=""))
}
```

## ðŸŽ¨ Art Example 6: Number triangle

```{r}
print("\n--- Number Triangle ---")
for (row in 1:5) {
  line <- ""
  for (col in 1:row) {
    if (col == 1) {
      line <- paste(line, col, sep="")
    } else {
      line <- paste(line, col, sep=" ")
    }
  }
  print(line)
}
```
